name: A Bird Hunt - Retro Bird Hunting Game
name_original: A Bird Hunt - Retro Bird Hunting Game
description:
A Bird Hunt is a fun nod to the retro classic Duck Hunt. You get 3 shots to shoot a bird - shoot all the birds and you advance to the next round. Compete against the world for the top score. Retro classic simplicity.

Please note due to copyright issues, this game had to be updated and all character imagery removed and the name changed.
